effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. User digs underground for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn. During the immune turn, earthquake, fissure, and magnitude still hit the user normally, and their power is doubled if appropriate. The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. User digs underground for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn. During the immune turn, earthquake, fissure, and magnitude still hit the user normally, and their power is doubled if appropriate. The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. User digs underground for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn. During the immune turn, earthquake, fissure, and magnitude still hit the user normally, and their power is doubled if appropriate. The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.
short_effect.platinum: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.
flavor_text.platinum: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.
